snippet.title: Motorcyclist badly hurt in mystery crash
snippet.content: A MOTORCYCLIST remains in a serious condition at Royal Darwin Hospital as police call for witnesses to the crash to come forward. Police were called to the crash on Bagot Rd at the Nightcliff Rd intersection at 11.20pm on Thursday. Detective Senior Sergeant Brendan Lindner said early indications suggested speed may have been a factor. "The rider remains in a serious condition in hospital," he said. Anyone who saw the crash or the motorcycle leading to the crash, call police on 131 444.
